long_description: Using high-performance wicking fabric, the Marmot Nabu jacket sets the new standard for a soft shell that protects you from harsh weather while remaining incredibly breathable. Polartec(R) Neoshell(R) soft shell material rapidly wicks moisture away from the skin. Seams are 100% taped for ultimate protection. 2 zippered front pockets sit high on the torso for pack and harness compatibility; 1 internal zippered pocket and 1 zippered chest pocket secure small essentials. Attached adjustable hood features a laminated wire brim that shields your face from precipitation; adjustable sleeve cuffs are asymmetrical to optimize coverage. The Marmot Nabu jacket features Angel-wing Movement(TM) sleeves that allow unrestricted arm motion so the jacket won't ride up.
short_description: Using high-performance wicking fabric, the Marmot Nabu jacket sets the new standard for a soft shell that protects you from harsh weather while remaining incredibly breathable.
